title: The Noblest Vengeance
description: Bodyguard partners Aidan and Liam are deeply in love, living as expatriates in Nice, France. When Aidan’s distant cousins in Istanbul need protection from dangerous adversaries, he and Liam are on the the next plane to Turkey. But the real danger to their relationship may come from their very different ideas about family connections. Can their love withstand assassins with a deadly secret to keep hidden--and Liam’s foul-mouthed mother?
author: Neil S. Plakcy
